title: Build cryptocurrency mining platform with TRC20 withdrawals and admin controls

requirements.text: Create user authentication system with account creation and login functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create new accounts with required fields
Users can log in with their credentials
Authentication state persists across sessions

requirements.text: Implement TRC20 (Binance) withdrawal system with 20 USDT minimum withdrawal amount

quotes: add withdrwa only binince only this trc20 oly

acceptanceCriteria: Withdrawal interface accepts TRC20 wallet addresses only
System enforces 20 USDT minimum withdrawal limit
Withdrawal requests are stored and tracked with status

requirements.text: Build mining interface with start button that initiates automatic mining for 1-5 day duration with 2 USDT daily earnings calculated at 2 USDT per 24 hours

Mining duration can be set between 1-5 days
System calculates and tracks earnings at 2 USDT per day rate
Mining runs automatically once started without manual intervention

Admin can approve withdrawal requests
Admin can reject withdrawal requests with reason

requirements.text: Integrate Telegram channel link https://t.me/Goldhunterfx345 and implement 1.5 USDT bonus system for users who follow the channel

acceptanceCriteria: Telegram channel link is prominently displayed with follow prompt

requirements.text: Design professional landing page with visually appealing background suitable for cryptocurrency mining theme
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page has professional cryptocurrency/mining themed design
Background uses high-quality imagery that looks authentic
Layout is clear and guides users to main actions (sign up, start mining)

constraints: Withdrawal system must support TRC20 (Binance) network only
Minimum withdrawal amount must be exactly 20 USDT
Mining earnings rate must be fixed at 2 USDT per day
Mining duration must be limited to 1-5 days range
Telegram channel link must be https://t.me/Goldhunterfx345
nonGoals: Support for other cryptocurrencies besides USDT
Support for other blockchain networks besides TRC20
Real cryptocurrency transactions or blockchain integration
